title: Automated extraction of post-stroke functional outcomes from unstructured electronic health records
details: M Fernandes, K Gallagher, N Turley, A Gupta… - European Stroke Journal, 2025
abstract: Purpose: Population level tracking of post-stroke functional outcomes is critical to guide interventions that reduce the burden of stroke-related disability. However, functional outcomes are often missing or documented in unstructured notes. We …

title: LungDiag: Empowering artificial intelligence for respiratory diseases diagnosis based on electronic health records, a multicenter study
details: H Liang, T Yang, Z Liu, W Jian, Y Chen, B Li, Z Yan… - MedComm, 2025
abstract: Respiratory diseases pose a significant global health burden, with challenges in early and accurate diagnosis due to overlapping clinical symptoms, which often leads to misdiagnosis or delayed treatment. To address this issue, we developed …

title: Review Of Readiness In Facing The Implementation Of Electronic Medical Records
details: S Wahyuni, A Amiruddin - International Journal of Multidisciplinary Learners, 2024
abstract: Background: Electronic medical records (RME) are an important aspect for management in dealing with health problems because they guarantee data integrity and accuracy. For health workers, RME also makes it easier to record patient health …
